attributes.long-description:
Indebted to the wrong people, veteran of the U.S. Cavalry and hired gun Booker DeWitt has only one opportunity to wipe his slate clean. He must rescue Elizabeth, a mysterious girl imprisoned since childhood in the flying city of Columbia. Forced to trust one another, Booker and Elizabeth form a powerful bond during their escape. Together, they learn to harness an expanding arsenal of weapons and abilities, as they fight on zeppelins, along high-speed Sky-Lines, and down in the streets of Columbia, all while surviving the threats of the sky-city and uncovering its dark secret.

The Bioshock Infinite Season Pass will continue the player’s journey, with new stories, new characters, and new weapons. The Early Bird Special pack contains four pieces of exclusive gear, a Machine Gun Damage Upgrade, a Pistol Damage Upgrade, a gold skin for both weapons and five Infusion bottles that allow you to increase your health, your shield durability or your ability to use Vigors.

1 player
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080p
PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move navigation controller or Wireless Controller optional.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems that are associated with the purchasing account.

Please note: Add-On Content, BioShock® Infinite required to play. Season Pass content will be available to purchasers in game upon release. Please check the product code on the spine of your BioShock® Infinite game box before purchasing. This Season Pass is compatible only with the North American (BLUS-30629) BioShock® Infinite disc.

PlayStation®Move features require PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye (sold separately).
attributes.name: BioShock® Infinite & Season Pass Bundle
